g.aria-label: Y-axis for a linear scale with values from 0 to 60
X-axis titled 'year' for a discrete scale with 50 values: 1971, 1972, 1973, 1974, 1975, ending with 2020
Y-axis titled '% of articles' for a linear scale with values from 0 to 60
Symbol legend titled '# of basins' for stroke color with 3 values: 0, 1, 2+
Title text 'Number of basins mentioned in articles'
g.text: Number of basins mentioned in articles
